item.title: Three hours of my day
item.description: Earlier this year I was promoted to be a staff software engineer. This involves not just problem solving, but also a (partial) responsibility for the culture of my workplace. One of the things I struggled with for a long time – long before I was working as a full-time programmer – was a lack of understanding of how senior people were able to come up with the clever ideas they come up with.
